presentation.fsa
Class ReflexiveEdge.ReflexiveHandler

java.lang.Object
  presentation.fsa.GraphElement
      presentation.fsa.EdgeHandler
          presentation.fsa.ReflexiveEdge.ReflexiveHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
PresentationElement
Enclosing class:
ReflexiveEdge
public class ReflexiveEdge.ReflexiveHandler
extends EdgeHandler

Visual representation of the single control point at the midpoint of a reflexive edge. Used to modify the size and orientation a reflexive edge.

Author:
helen bretzke
